album.strAlbum: Music Has the Right to Children
album.strDescriptionEN: Music Has the Right to Children is the debut studio album by Scottish electronic music duo Boards of Canada. It was published by Warp Records and released on 20 April 1998 in Europe and 20 August in the United States. The album was produced at Hexagon Sun, the duo's personal recording studio.  The songs utilise a number of field recordings and intensive sound manipulation.
